p: Results: 22 cases were identified accounting for 0.8 % of all admissions in our unit. The pathogen was mainly isolated from soft tissue wounds and sputum. Median age of cases was 50 years. Organ support was as defined in the UK CCMDS [1] (Critical Care Minimum Dataset definitions). The table lists the number of patients with respiratory, cardiovascular and renal support, data on length of stay, illness severity as assessed by APACHE 2 score [2] and mortality rates.
